The photo was posted on Twitter on March: 2019, and has been retweeted around 1,600 times since.
The caption of the misleading tweet clai: with 250 security men guarding him and 7 media team members present.
The slogan: Naya Pakistan" mentioned in the caption is associated with the ruling party Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI), which came to power in July 2018.
The photo was also published in a report: which stated that the president was resting at Islamabad Airport and the photo went viral on social media, with Pakistanis praising his simplicity.
